IBosonRemoteConfig.description:
For remote networks, we cannot control how they're started. But having a
separate type for live configurations could make code clearer.

TODO[hengchu]: I'm not super sure what the parameters should be yet.

backend.description: Backend to use. Default is geth.

chain.description: Name of the chain. Default is ethereum.

datadir.description: The directory to store accounts in.

hosts.description: A non-empty array of host IP:port addresses, in that format.
